Package com.doa.engine

Class DoaHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.doa.engine.DoaHandler
  • public final class DoaHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for keeping track of all DoaObjects. All DoaObjects and its respective child-classes are automatically added to DoaHandler after they are created with invoking instantiate(Class, Object...), and have their DoaObject.tick() and DoaObject.render(DoaGraphicsContext) methods called by DoaEngine. This class is static, therefore has no objects.
    Since:
    DoaEngine 1.0
    Version:
    2.5
    Author:
    Doga Oruc

    • Method Summary

      static void add​(DoaObject o)
      Adds the specified DoaObject to DoaHandler.

      Removes ALL of the DoaObjects from DoaHandler.

    • Method Detail

      • instantiate

        public static <T extends DoaObject> T instantiate​(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                                  java.lang.Object... constructorArgs)
        Instantiates a new DoaObject and adds it to DoaHandler.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the class
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class of the DoaObject to be instantiated
        constructorArgs - arguments for the constructor
        Returns:
        the instantiated DoaObject or null if instantiation is unsuccessful

      • add

        public static void add​(DoaObject o)
        Adds the specified DoaObject to DoaHandler.
        Parameters:
        o - object to add to DoaHandler

      • remove

        public static void remove​(DoaObject o)
        Removes the specified DoaObject from DoaHandler.
        Parameters:
        o - object to remove from DoaHandler

      • clear

        public static void clear()
        Removes ALL of the DoaObjects from DoaHandler. DoaHandler will be empty after this method returns.
